snippet.title: Hollywood Animal — Release Trailer (Early Access)
snippet.description:
Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2680550/Hollywood_Animal/?utm_medium=announcementtrailer&utm_source=youtube

Make movies, even if someone has to die. Take the helm of a major Hollywood studio at the dawn of sound cinema, and guide it through decades of creative achievements and glamor, debauchery and dark deeds, tough choices and unpleasant compromises. In this cruel business, the law of survival is the only one that matters.


Check news on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WeappyStudio
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://youtube.com/@WeappyStudio

#hollywoodanimal #hollywoodanimalgame #hagame #Weappy #steam #thisisthepolice #titp
